getEvent: SELECT eid, title, title_en, description, description_en, latitude, longitude, type, DATE_FORMAT(start, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as start, DATE_FORMAT(stop, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as stop, contributor, icon from external_events WHERE stop > NOW() ORDER BY start DESC
getEventHaveLimitFirstTime: SELECT eid, title, title_en, description, description_en, latitude, longitude, type, DATE_FORMAT(start, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as start, DATE_FORMAT(stop, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as stop, contributor, icon from external_events WHERE stop > NOW() ORDER BY start DESC LIMIT ?
getEventHaveLimit: SELECT eid, title, title_en, description, description_en, latitude, longitude, type, DATE_FORMAT(start, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as start, DATE_FORMAT(stop, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as stop, contributor, icon from external_events WHERE stop > NOW() AND start < ? ORDER BY start DESC LIMIT ?
getEventId: SELECT eid from external_events WHERE stop >= NOW() ORDER BY start DESC
getEventByType: SELECT eid, title, title_en, description, description_en, latitude, longitude, type, DATE_FORMAT(start, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as start, DATE_FORMAT(stop, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as stop, contributor, icon from external_events WHERE stop > NOW() AND type = ? ORDER BY start DESC
insertEvent: INSERT INTO external_events(eid, title, title_en, description, description_en, latitude, longitude, type, start, stop, contributor, icon) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE start=VALUES(start), stop=VALUES(stop), description=VALUES(description), description_en=VALUES(description_en)
